channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 58 – Koh Phangan To Bangkok
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Not too soon at all :D (Sorry for the late response... I'm catching up on blog comments)
item.content:encoded:
Not too soon at all :D
(Sorry for the late response… I’m catching up on blog comments)

item.title: By: udim
item.dc:creator: udim
item.description: "...so I tried to walk the emptier streets to see if I can find some local gems." So you were looking for trouble? :P Or maybe they were reading your blog? (too soon?)
item.content:encoded:
“…so I tried to walk the emptier streets to see if I can find some local gems.”
So you were looking for trouble? :P
Or maybe they were reading your blog?
(too soon?)

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
:) If that's the case with the Grand Palace I'll need to find other things to do today.
No, I'm not very excited about current smartphones. I'm looking for a simple calls/sms phone. They are available is Israel as well but I'm sure I'll find an interesting variety here.
item.content:encoded:
:) If that’s the case with the Grand Palace I’ll need to find other things to do today.

No, I’m not very excited about current smartphones. I’m looking for a simple calls/sms phone. They are available is Israel as well but I’m sure I’ll find an interesting variety here.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
If you'll stay for 2 hours in the Grand Palace I'm sure you'll break the record for "the longest time an Israeli spent in Grand Palace" ... (basicaly I'm giving you a moral excuse to get out of there after 3 minutes)...
Are you getting an iphone?
item.content:encoded:
If you’ll stay for 2 hours in the Grand Palace I’m sure you’ll break the record for “the longest time an Israeli spent in Grand Palace” … (basicaly I’m giving you a moral excuse to get out of there after 3 minutes)…

Are you getting an iphone?
